contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|fader|Fader}} '''Fader''' may refer to: * [[Fader (audio engineering)]], a device for gradually increasing or decreasing the level of an audio signal {{TOC right}} == Music == * [[Fader (Paradise Lost song)|"Fader" (Paradise Lost song)]], 2001 * [[Fader (The Temper Trap song)|"Fader" (The Temper Trap song)]], 2009 * [[Fader Label]], an American independent record label * [[The Faders]], a British female pop rock band 2004-06 == Other uses== * [[Fader (surname)]] * ''[[The Fader]]'', an American music, culture, and fashion publication * Fader, an [[List of Imperial Guard members#2000s recruits|Imperial Guard member]] in the Marvel Comics universe == See also == * [[Fade (disambiguation)]] * [[Faded (disambiguation)]] * [[Fade in (disambiguation)]] * [[Fade out (disambiguation)]] * [[Feder]], a surname {{Disambiguation}}
